About Me

I'm a full stack web developer with a passion for creative design and problem solving. I have 3+ years of professional experience in all phases of the development process. I believe coding is an artform and I work hard everyday at perfecting my craft.
Strategy
I collaborate with clients and peers to transform raw ideas into well thought out designs. After all, one of the hardest parts about any project is deciding where to begin.
UX/UI
I sketch and wireframe interfaces focusing on content structure, intuitive UI patterns and simple interactions. I'm a minimalist who believes simple is beautiful, but also really hard.
Code
I love bringing the designs to life through HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. While I enjoy coding things from scratch, I'm experienced working with a wide range of technologies and frameworks.
